message:
Update XmlLayout to use typed parameters in factory method.

  - Also added createDefaultLayout method for convenience.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/logging/log4j/log4j2/trunk@1597389 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

added: final XmlLayout layout = XmlLayout.createLayout(includeSource, includeContext, false, compact, Charsets.UTF_8);
final XmlLayout layout = XmlLayout.createLayout(true, true, true, false, null);
final XmlLayout layout = XmlLayout.createLayout(false, true, true, false, null);
deleted: final XmlLayout layout = XmlLayout.createLayout(null, null, null, null, null);
final XmlLayout layout = XmlLayout.createLayout(null, null, null, null, null);
final XmlLayout layout = XmlLayout.createLayout("true", "true", "true", null, null);
final XmlLayout layout = XmlLayout.createLayout("false", "true", "true", null, null);
